sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Nav v-if="pages" :pages="pages" :active-page="activePage" :nav-link-click="(index)=> activePage = index"> </Nav>
    <PageViewer v-if="pages" :page="pages[activePage]"> </PageViewer>
</template>

<script>
    import PageViewer from './components/PageViewer.vue';
    import Nav from './components/Nav.vue';

    export default{
        components: {
            PageViewer,
            Nav,
        },
        data(){
            return{
                    activePage: 0,
                    pages: [],
                };
        },
        async created(){
            await this.getPages();
        },
        method: {
            async getPages() {
                let res = await fetch('pages.json')
                let data = await res.json();
                this.pages = data;
            }
        }
    }
</script>
